Package src.recomanador.persistencia

Class ControladorPersistencia

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.persistencia.ControladorPersistencia
public class ControladorPersistencia extends Object
The class ControladorPersistencia implements the functionalities of writing and reading data from memory. It also manages the folder structure where the information will be stored.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControladorPersistencia

      private ControladorPersistencia()
      Creates a new instance of the class ControladorPersistencia. It also finds the data folder, and if it doen't exist, it creates it.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ControladorPersistencia getInstance()
      Returs the only instance of the class, and if it's not created, it creates it.
      Returns:
      The instance.

    • getNomProjecte

      public String getNomProjecte() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      It returns the name of the project that is being used. This name represents a folder inside /data, where the information will be held.
      Returns:
      The name of the folder is returned, or null in case there's no folder assigned to.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a an exception if the folder is missing.

    • llistatCarpetes

      public ArrayList<String> llistatCarpetes()
      Shows all the folders that are inside /data. These folders represents the projects that the user can choose.
      Returns:
      Returns all the folders that are inside the saved projects folder.

    • existeixenDadesPreprocesades

      public boolean existeixenDadesPreprocesades()
      Informs you if there are all the necessary files for loading ALL the preprocessed data.
      Returns:
      Returns true if all the files needed for the preprocessed data are in the folder. Otherwise it returns false;

    • existeixenTestos

      public boolean existeixenTestos()
      Informs you if there are all the necessary files for loading the test data.
      Returns:
      Returns true if all the files needed for testing the algorithm are in the folder. Otherwise it returns false;

    • escollirProjecte

      public void escollirProjecte(String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException
      Establishes the name of the project, which is the one that has the folder that contains the information that will be loaded, and it's where the information will be stored. It also loads the state of the algorithm if it existed, or it creates one with -1 as all values (except for the name, that will have "ERROR_NameNotValid").
      Parameters:
      s - Represents the name of the folder, which sholde be chosen among the list of existing folders.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException - Throws an exception if the folder is incorrect.

    • sortirDelProjecte

      public void sortirDelProjecte()
      Establishes the project folder and the estat ArrayList as null to indicate that there's no project selected.

    • carregarArxiuCarpeta

      private ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> carregarArxiuCarpeta(String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Reads a file specified from the folder "carpeta". The file must be a .csv file (or at least the content must have that structure), and needs to have the same number of columns for every row.
      Parameters:
      s - Specifies the file that will be read.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarRecomanacionsCarpeta

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> carregarRecomanacionsCarpeta() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns the recomendations and valorations read from memory
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarItemsCarpeta

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> carregarItemsCarpeta() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns the items read from memory
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarPesosAtributs

      public ArrayList<String> carregarPesosAtributs() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns some information read from memory about the items: the weights of the attributes.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of the values (represented as Strings).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarTipusAtributs

      public ArrayList<String> carregarTipusAtributs() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns some information read from memory about the items: the type of the attributes (floats, integers, strings, ...).
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of the types (represented as Strings).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarTestKnown

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> carregarTestKnown() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns some valorations read from memory. These are used for testing the algoritm, and it's data that can be added to the program.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarTestUnknown

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> carregarTestUnknown() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns some valorations read from memory. These are used for testing the algoritm, but it's not intended for them to be added to the program's input, as this is used for comparing the results of the algorithm.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarFitxerExtern

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> carregarFitxerExtern(String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotFoundException
      Returns a csv table read from memory
      Parameters:
      s - Specifies the absolute path of the file you want to read
      Returns:
      Returns an array of arrays of the values. Each array of arrays(line) contains an array of strings (columns). The first line corresponds to the header of the file, where each column is its identifier. The rest of the lines contain the values read.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotValidException - Throws a FileNotValidException if the file is corrupted.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotFoundException - Throws a FileNotFoundException if the file is missing.

    • carregarMaxAtributsItems

      public ArrayList<String> carregarMaxAtributsItems() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns some information read from memory about the items: the maximum value of every attribute from the item set.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of the values (represented as Strings).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarMinAtributsItems

      public ArrayList<String> carregarMinAtributsItems() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Returns some information read from memory about the items: the minimum value of every attribute from the item set.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of the values (represented as Strings).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • carregarEstat

      public ArrayList<String> carregarEstat() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Loads the following values if the folder specified by the attribute carpeta contains them: The attributes are ordered inside the array as stated below:
         0. algorisme_seleccionat
         1. Q
         2. K
         3. nom_cjt_items
         4. pos_id
         5. pos_nom
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of the values (represented as Strings).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • crearProjecte

      public void crearProjecte(String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Creates an empty folder to store all the files. It also sets the variable carpeta as the file pointing the new one.
      Parameters:
      s - It's the name that the folder will have. It can only contain letters, numbers, '.', '-' and '_'
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarDades

      private void guardarDades(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> D, String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Save the data into the file specified.
      To avoid data loss, a temporal file is created, and then it's replaced by the original one. This prevents the anihilation of the data in case that the computer suddenlty stops working.
      Parameters:
      D - It's an ArrayList of ArrayList of Strings. The array needs to have the same number of columns for each row. Usually, the first line is interpreted as the header, but it's not mandatory.
      s - It's the name that the file will have. It's recommended that it ends with .csv, as the data will be stored in that format.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarRecomanacions

      public void guardarRecomanacions(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> D) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Save the data into the file ratings.db.csv
      Parameters:
      D - It's an ArrayList of ArrayList of Strings. The array needs to have the same number of columns for each row. The first line is interpreted as the header.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarItems

      public void guardarItems(ArrayList<String> head, ArrayList<ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>> body) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Save the data into the file items.csv
      Parameters:
      head - It's an ArrayList of Strings. It represents the header of the .csv table, and will be printed as the first line
      body - It's an ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of Strings. It represents for each row, an ArrayList of columns. Each column can contain a variable number of strings, so the content of the column is specified as an ArrayList of Strings. (These multiple values will be concatenated, adding a ';' betwen them.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarPesosAtributs

      public void guardarPesosAtributs(ArrayList<String> pesos) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Save the data into the file pesos.csv
      Parameters:
      pesos - It's an ArrayList of Floats wich represents the weight of each attribute from the item set.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarTipusAtributs

      public void guardarTipusAtributs(ArrayList<String> tip) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Save the data into the file tipus.csv
      Parameters:
      tip - It's an ArrayList of Strings wich represents the type of each attribute from the item set.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarMaxAtributsItems

      Save the data into the file maxAtributs.items.csv
      Parameters:
      max_atr - It's an ArrayList of Strings wich contains the maximum value of each attribute from the item set.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarMinAtributsItems

      public void guardarMinAtributsItems(ArrayList<String> min_atr) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted.

    • guardarEstat

      public void guardarEstat(ArrayList<String> estat) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Save the data from the estat ArrayList into the file estat.csv
      Parameters:
      estat - The values that need to be stored: (algorisme_seleccionat | Q | K | nom_cjt_items | pos_id | pos_nom)
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted.

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> TESTcarregarArxiuCarpeta(String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Implements a public format for the function carregarArxiuCarpeta(...). Reads the file specified from the folder "carpeta".
      After Testing, this function will be eliminated.
      For a demonstration that this function will work if and only if carregarArxiuCarpeta(...) works, go to line 834 on the source code. The demonstration lets us test the private class unsing this one.
      Parameters:
      s - Specifies the file that will be read.
      Returns:
      Returns an ArrayList of ArrayList of the values. Each ArrayList of ArrayList(line) contains an array of strings (columns).
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws an exception if the file is corrupted or is missing.

    • TESTguardarDades

      public void TESTguardarDades(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> D, String s) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Implements a public format for the function guardarDades(...). It saves the data into the file specified.
      After Testing, this function will be eliminated.
      For a demonstration that this function will work if and only if guardarDades(...) works, go to line 834 on the source code. The demonstration lets us test the private class unsing this one.
      Parameters:
      D - It's an ArrayList of ArrayList of Strings. The array needs to have the same number of columns for each row. Usually, the first line is interpreted as the header, but it's not mandatory.
      s - It's the name that the file will have. It's recommended that it ends with .csv, as the data will be stored in that format.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Throws a FolderNotValidException if the file is corrupted.
